episodes.title: El yoyo
episodes.plot: In the first story, Cyrano de Bergerac, a brave poet/soldier, is cursed with a gigantic nose. He is in love with Roxana, but she is love with the moronic Christian de Neuvillette, so now Cyrano has to help him. In the second story, Don Ramón is sowing plants in the patio. After Doña Florinda unjustly slaps him in the face, Don Ramón, Mr. Barriga, Chavo and Quico come up with a new motto: we must love our enemies.

episodes.title: El duelo
episodes.plot: Quico is sick and Doña Florinda sends Don Ramón to buy the medicine. Chavo visits Quico and they play inside the house: Chavo is a doctor and Quico is his patient. When Quico tastes the medicine, he recruits Chavo to get rid of it.

episodes.title: El perrito de Quico - parte 2
episodes.plot: Mr. Barriga forbids having animals in the neighborhood, so Doña Florinda has to return Quico's dog. However, Chavo, Quico and Popis think "the Witch from No. 71" has casted a spell on the dog, and turned it into a watering can.

episodes.title: El perrito de Quico - parte 2
episodes.plot: When Chavo, Quico and Ñoño break one of Doña Florinda's chairs, she thinks Don Ramón did it, and now he has to fix the chair. It won't be easy, thanks to Chavo's constant interruptions.
